==Translingual==

===Etymology===
: [[火]] (fire) + [[夬]], the latter being derived from [[缺]] (lack) of which it is the phonetic element. This is coined in light of the observed lack of two of the hydrogens in alkenes and the fact that alkynes are flammable.
